scripts.dc: export COMMIT_HASH="$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" && export COMMIT_TAG="$(git tag --contains ${COMMIT_HASH})" && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml
scripts.build: yarn prepare:docker && yarn dc build && yarn dc run app sh -c "chmod -R 775 ./storage && chown -R interopdev:www-data *"
scripts.build:prod: yarn prepare:docker && APP_ENV=production yarn dc build
scripts.deps: yarn dc run app sh -c "npm i && composer install"
scripts.dev:deploy: yarn build && yarn deps && yarn dc run app sh -c "npm run prod" && yarn migrate && yarn down && yarn dev -d
scripts.seed: yarn dc run app sh -c "/wait && php artisan migrate:fresh --seed"
scripts.migrate: yarn dc run app sh -c "/wait && php artisan migrate --force"
scripts.runtest: yarn dc run app sh -c "/wait && mkdir -p ../results && phpdbg -qrr vendor/bin/phpunit --coverage-html=results"
scripts.rundusk: yarn dc -f ./compose/dusk.yml run queue sh -c "/wait && php artisan dusk"
scripts.mtls:renew: yarn dc exec app sh -c 'php artisan certificates:generate-ca' && yarn dc exec -u root app sh -c '/etc/periodic/15min/client-CA-nginx-renew.sh'
